entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
